name: server-setup
description: Complete server setup with web servers, databases, and development tools

nginx.name: nginx
nginx.description: High-performance web server and reverse proxy
nginx.postInstall: systemctl enable nginx && systemctl start nginx

apache.name: apache
apache.postInstall: systemctl enable apache2 && systemctl start apache2

postgresql.name: postgresql

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y postgresql postgresql-contrib

postgresql.postInstall: systemctl enable postgresql && systemctl start postgresql

mysql.name: mysql

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y mysql-server mysql-client

mysql.postInstall: systemctl enable mysql && systemctl start mysql

mariadb.name: mariadb

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y mariadb-server mariadb-client

mariadb.postInstall: systemctl enable mariadb && systemctl start mariadb

mongodb.name: mongodb

commands.install: wget -qO - https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-6.0.asc | apt-key add - && echo 'deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu jammy/mongodb-org/6.0 multiverse' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-6.0.list && apt update && apt install -y mongodb-org
commands.remove: apt remove -y mongodb-org mongodb-org-mongos mongodb-org-server mongodb-org-shell mongodb-org-tools

mongodb.postInstall: systemctl enable mongod && systemctl start mongod

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_lts.x | bash - && apt install -y nodejs

docker.name: docker

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh && sh get-docker.sh && usermod -aG docker $USER
commands.remove: apt remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin

docker.postInstall: systemctl enable docker && systemctl start docker

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | dd of=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg && chmod go+r /usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg] https://cli.github.com/packages stable main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null && apt update && apt install -y gh

pm2.name: pm2
pm2.description: Production process manager for Node.js applications
